T02D2548:18b-0: @18b * // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2548:18b-1: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i khrus kyi cho ga
T02D2548:18b-2: ni dang por bum pa bhr'um las ye shes kyis
T02D2548:18b-3: kyi gzhal yas khang du bsams la /
T02D2548:18b-4: de'i nang du bam las 'o ma can gyi rgya mtsho bsams te /
T02D2548:18b-5: de'i steng du hr'i: las padma dkar po 'dab ma dang bcas par bsams la /
T02D2548:18b-7: de 'od du zhu bar gyur pa las autpa la dkar po cig bsam /
T02D2548:18b-8: de zhu ba las 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sku mdog ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba /
T02D2548:19a-0: @19a * // g-yas na autpala sngon po ral gris mchan pa /
T02D2548:19a-1: g-yon na autpala sngon po po tis mtshan pa bsgom /
T02D2548:19a-2: de'i snying gar zla ba la mum bsam /
T02D2548:19a-3: de'i 'od zer gyis de dang 'dra ba spyan drangs la bstim /
T02D2548:19a-4: sngags 'di brjod pas ye shes kyi chur zhu bar bsam /
T02D2548:19a-5: aom sarba dharm'a aa bh'a ba sva bh'a ba bi shuddha badzra tsakshu aa a'a aam aa:/
T02D2548:19a-6: zhes brjod pas ye shes kyi chus khrus byas pas rang gi sgo gsum dag par bya'o //
T02D2548:19a-8: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod
T02D2548:19a-9: pa'i khrus kyi cho ga / slob dpon 'jam dpal
